titles.title: A bill for the relief of Reza A. Maleki.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S14838-14839)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Affairs.

bill.summary: 11/2/1993--Introduced. Declares a named individual to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
